mapper.select: select LONG_ from ACT_RU_VARIABLE where NAME_='nrOfActiveInstances' and PROC_INST_ID_= #{proInstId}

select ac.id,it.institutionname,date_format(str_to_date(ac.term, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') as term,rt.templatename from account ac INNER JOIN INSTITUTION it on AC.INSTITUTION_ID=it.id INNER JOIN ReportTemplate rt ON ac.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID=rt.id where ac.accountstate=2
and date_format(str_to_date(ac.term, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') = #{term}
and rt.templatename like concat(concat('%',#{templateName}),'%')
and it.institutionname like concat(concat('%',#{institutionname}),'%')
order by ac.id

select ac.id, it.institutionname, date_format(str_to_date(ac.term, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') as term, ap.templatename from account ac INNER JOIN INSTITUTION it on AC.INSTITUTION_ID = it.id INNER JOIN reporttemplate ap ON ac.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID = ap.id WHERE exists (select * from (SELECT t1.term as s FROM ACCOUNT T1 LEFT JOIN reporttemplate LETE ON LETE.ID = T1.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID) a1 where a1.s = ac.term) AND (ac.SUBMITSTATETYPE = 1 OR ac.SUBMITSTATETYPE = 0) and exists (select id, ff from (select i.id, 0 as ff from institution i left join sysuser u on i.id = u.org_id where u.id = #{userId} union all select i.id, 1 as ff from institution i left join sysuser u on i.id = u.org_id or i.parentinstitution_id = u.org_id where u.id = #{userId} union all SELECT id, 2 AS ff FROM Institution where FIND_IN_SET(id,queryChildrenInstitutionInfoByUserId(#{userId}))) a where a.ff = (select max(t1.institutelevel) as lev from account ac,reportpermission t1 right join role_reportpermission t2 on t1.id = t2.reportpermission_id where exists (select 1 from sysuser_role s where s.roles_id = t2.role_id and s.sysuser_id = #{userId}) and t1.operationtype = 0 and t1.reporttemplateid = ac.accounttemplate_id) and id = ac.institution_id)
and date_format(str_to_date(ac.term, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') = #{term}
and ap.templatename like concat(concat('%',#{templateName}),'%')
and it.institutionname like concat(concat('%',#{institutionname}),'%')
order by ac.id

select count(*) from ( select ac.id, it.institutionname, date_format(str_to_date(ac.term, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') as term, ap.templatename from account ac INNER JOIN INSTITUTION it on AC.INSTITUTION_ID = it.id INNER JOIN reporttemplate ap ON ac.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID = ap.id WHERE exists (select * from (SELECT t1.term as s FROM ACCOUNT T1 LEFT JOIN reporttemplate LETE ON LETE.ID = T1.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID) a1 where a1.s = ac.term) AND (ac.SUBMITSTATETYPE = 1 OR ac.SUBMITSTATETYPE = 0) and exists (select id, ff from (select i.id, 0 as ff from institution i left join sysuser u on i.id = u.org_id where u.id = #{userId} union all select i.id, 1 as ff from institution i left join sysuser u on i.id = u.org_id or i.parentinstitution_id = u.org_id where u.id = #{userId} union all SELECT id, 2 AS ff FROM Institution where FIND_IN_SET(id,queryChildrenInstitutionInfoByUserId(#{userId}))) a where a.ff = (select max(t1.institutelevel) as lev from account ac,reportpermission t1 right join role_reportpermission t2 on t1.id = t2.reportpermission_id where exists (select 1 from sysuser_role s where s.roles_id = t2.role_id and s.sysuser_id = #{userId}) and t1.operationtype = 0 and t1.reporttemplateid = ac.accounttemplate_id) and id = ac.institution_id)
and date_format(str_to_date(ac.term, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') = #{term}
and ap.templatename like concat(concat('%',#{templateName}),'%')
and it.institutionname like concat(concat('%',#{institutionname}),'%')
order by ac.id )a

select a.* from (select a.id, a.content, a.reasonDescType, a.time, a.username, a.status,case when a.reasonDescType = '2' then 1 else a.rn end as rn from (SELECT reptReas.*, IF ( @reasonDescType = reptReas.reasonDescType ,@rank :=@rank + 1 ,@rank := 1 ) AS rn, @reasonDescType = reptReas.reasonDescType as reasonDescType_ FROM ( select rs.*, su.username from REPORTREASON rs left join sysuser su on rs.userid = su.id inner join REPORTREASON_REPORT RR ON rs.id = RR.REPORTREASON_ID and rs.status = 1 inner join report r on RR.REPORTS_ID = r.id and RR.REPORTS_ID = #{reportId} order by rs.time desc ) reptReas, ( SELECT @reasonDescType := NULL ,@rank := 0 ) a ) a) a where a.rn=1
select a.id from account a left join reporttemplate b on a.accounttemplate_id = b.id where b.id = #{templateId}
